"We are already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. The 19 year Microsoft veteran will take the reigns Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platforms from outgoing president Bob Muglia. In January, the company announced that Muglia would be leaving Redmond
